title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Nov 20 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Nov 20 2021
description:
Joining C&B in the second hour, Jedediah Bila, former schoolteacher, new mom and author of Dear Hartley on why she is mad as hell over the vaccine mandates. Jedediah Bila vs The View. Where is the discussion on natural immunity? Another liberal lie dies in darkness: DHS inspector general declined to investigate horse-mounted Border Patrol 'whipping' accusation. Biden's approval rating continues to plummet, Republicans up 10 points in generic poll. Surprise: The budget bill costs trillions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
